messages.title: Only Labour can beat the Tories
messages.content: A vote for the Lib Dems or any other party will let the Tories win.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour guarantees that you will see a cancer specialist within two weeks of GP referral. The NHS now has 89,000 more nurses and 44,000 doctors than in 1997. Over three-quarters of GP practices now offer extended opening hours.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A vote for the Lib Dems or any other party will let the Tories win.

issues.health: Labour guarantees that you will see a cancer specialist within two weeks of GP referral. The NHS now has 89,000 more nurses and 44,000 doctors than in 1997. Over three-quarters of GP practices now offer extended opening hours.

images.caption: Only Labour can beat the Tories

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contrasts Labour's healthcare policies with the Tories' plans to cut resources from existing schools to create new school buildings. It presents a tactical voting message indicating that voting for the Lib Dems could lead to a Tory win in the general election.
